title: im stuck in reconnect screen
body:
last time i wanna play ranked  game, client told me that i am already in a game. but truth is, I didnt even in the bp process.
so I went to watch videos.
then my friend ask me to duo. i login again, and it stuck in the reconnect screen

LOL.

replies.body:
Seems you experienced a ghost game. This happens when the game server you were playing on fails to communicate the game-end message to PVP.Net.

The ghost game will fix on itâ€™s own and usually lasts a maximum of 2 hours after this occurs. Sometimes this issue can be fixed by relogging into League of Legends. Occasionally, restarting your computer may help. These actions force the client to request a new update.
Same for me, can't get into client.
this has been resolved for me, but the ranked game that i won didnt count{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
me too, from now is already 3hours still stuck at reconect stuff

Also stuck in reconnect screen :/ We won our hexakill game and went to lobby but couldn't make a room, then when I reset the client it told me I need to reconnect to a game that either has finished or never actually got created >.<
I am also stuck :( And my promos game had 2 people dc :'(
i finished a normal game an got stuck on the reconnect screen to... an i cant do anything about it, log out an in an it ask's me if i wanna reconnect to the game
